scripts.bundle:all: pnpm run bundle:shop && pnpm run bundle:user && pnpm run bundle:admin
scripts.validate:all: pnpm run validate:shop && pnpm run validate:user && pnpm run validate:admin
scripts.preview:shop: npx open-cli http://localhost:8080 && python3 -m http.server 8080 --directory docs/shop
scripts.preview:user: npx open-cli http://localhost:8080 && python3 -m http.server 8080 --directory docs/user
scripts.preview:admin: npx open-cli http://localhost:8080 && python3 -m http.server 8080 --directory docs/admin
scripts.docs:build: pnpm run bundle:all && npm run docs:build:html
scripts.docs:build:html: mkdir -p docs && npx @redocly/cli build-docs bundled/shop.openapi.yaml -o docs/shop/index.html && npx @redocly/cli build-docs bundled/user.openapi.yaml -o docs/user/index.html && npx @redocly/cli build-docs bundled/admin.openapi.yaml -o docs/admin/index.html
scripts.docs:all: pnpm run docs:build && pnpm run docs:portal
